abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Boston Bruins, 5-2.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers furthered their push for the playoffs and home-ice advantage in the first round with a victory over Boston, which has lost four straight.

headline.main: Rangers Strengthen Position and Deal Bruins Another Loss
headline.print_headline: Rangers Strengthen Position and Deal Bruins Another Loss

snippet: The Rangers furthered their push for the playoffs and home-ice advantage in the first round with a victory over Boston, which has lost four straight.
